department.dept_long_name: Department of Visual and Environmental Studies

course.title: Nonfiction Today
course.meeting_text: Tuesdays 10am-12pm and a mandatory weekly film screening on Mondays 4pm to 6pm
course.description: This class will survey recent developments and contemporary tendencies in nonfiction film, in particular those that have led to a redefinition and reconsideration of the form. Topics include the role of digital technology, the status of the moving image in contemporary art, and the proliferation of documentary-fiction hybrid films.
